item.title: Twitter、レート制限を事前に通知すれば悪質業者は検知を逃れられたと主張し、レート制限が広告に与えた影響は「最小限」だったと語る（Kris Holt/Engadget）
item.description:
Kris Holt / Engadget:
Twitter claims advanced notice about rate limiting would have allowed bad actors to evade detection and says rate limiting had a “minimal” effect on advertising  —  The company claims bad actors could otherwise have changed their strategies.  —  Twitter has been even more of a mess …

item.title: 買収交渉の失敗、山のような負債、そして別の失敗したDSPのCEOを雇うような稚拙なリーダーシップの決定によって引き起こされたメディアマス社の終焉（Kendra Clark/The Drum）
item.description:
Kendra Clark / The Drum:
A look at MediaMath's demise, caused by failed acquisition talks, a mountain of debt, and poor leadership decisions, like hiring the CEO of another failed DSP  —  The adtech company filed for bankruptcy on Friday, leaving investors, staff, customers and ecosystem partners in limbo.

item.title: 英国のある町のローカルニュースを扱うと称するウェブサイトが、ストック写真を使った11人の偽ジャーナリストのプロフィールで2023年6月に開設されていたことが調査で判明した（David Sharman/HoldtheFrontPage）
item.description:
David Sharman / HoldtheFrontPage:
An investigation finds that a website purporting to cover local news in a UK town launched in June 2023 with 11 fake journalist profiles that used stock photos  —  Fake journalist profiles have been used to launch a new website purporting to cover local news in a UK town, an HTFP investigation has found.

item.title: Brutのギョーム・ラクロワCEOによると、このデジタルメディア・スタートアップは、フランスの暴動のライブ中継がバイラル化した後、TikTokの登録者を70万人増やし、530万人に達したという（Benoit Berthelot/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Benoit Berthelot / Bloomberg:
Brut CEO Guillaume Lacroix says the digital media startup gained 700K TikTok subscribers to reach 5.3M after its live coverage of the riots in France went viral  —  Video footage of the riots in France were hugely popular on social media last week as unrest spread throughout the country …

item.title: 武装した覆面の男たちが、チェチェンで『ノヴァヤ・ガゼータ』紙の著名ロシア人ジャーナリスト、イェレナ・ミラシナと弁護士のアレクサンドル・ネモフを襲撃し、重傷を負わせた（Andrew Osborn/Reuters）
item.description:
Andrew Osborn / Reuters:
Armed masked men attack and seriously injure prominent Russian journalist Yelena Milashina, who writes for Novaya Gazeta, and lawyer Alexander Nemov in Chechnya  —  Armed masked men attacked and seriously injured a prominent female Russian journalist and a lawyer in the Russian region …

item.title: CJEUは、2019年にメタ社に広告事業の見直しを命じたドイツの連邦カルテル庁に行き過ぎはなかったとの裁定を下し、メタ社は裁定を「評価」している（Stephanie Bodoni/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Stephanie Bodoni / Bloomberg:
The CJEU rules that Germany's Federal Cartel Office didn't overstep when ordering Meta to overhaul its ad business in 2019; Meta is “evaluating” the ruling  —  Meta Platforms Inc.'s Facebook lost its European Union court fight over a German antitrust order that homed …

item.title: 情報筋アリババはYoukuとTudouについて、アリババの再編に伴い、動画ストリーミング部門を香港上場のアリババ・ピクチャーズに移すなどの選択肢を模索している（Bloomberg）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Alibaba is exploring options for Youku and Tudou, like moving the video streaming units to Hong Kong-listed Alibaba Pictures, as Alibaba restructures  —  Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is exploring options for its video entertainment assets, according to people familiar with the matter …

item.title: 新オーナー、ブライアン・カールが復活を計画するペーパー・マガジンの歴史を、共同創設者のキム・ハストレイターとデヴィッド・ハーシュコヴィッツ、元スタッフ、ライターらから聞く（John Ortved/New York Times）
item.description:
John Ortved / New York Times:
A history of Paper Magazine from co-founders Kim Hastreiter and David Hershkovits, former staff, writers, and others, as new owner Brian Calle plans its revival  —  It started as a chronicler of all things downtown.  After success came, it morphed into something else.  Now Paper has a new owner — and an uncertain future.

item.title: アマゾンとグッドレッズの元従業員が、アマゾンが限られたリソースでグッドレッズをいかに停滞させながら、ユーザー生成データのために書評サイトを採掘していたかを詳述（Caroline O'Donovan/Washington Post）
item.description:
Caroline O'Donovan / Washington Post:
Former Amazon and Goodreads employees detail how Amazon let Goodreads languish with limited resources while mining the book review site for user-generated data  —  A prominent author's decision to pull her new novel from publication after being ‘review bombed’ highlights Goodreads's power in publishing …

item.title: リバプールの雑誌印刷会社プリノヴィスが閉鎖、ライバルのウォルステッドが事実上の独占状態に。
item.description:
Mark Sweney / The Guardian:
Liverpool-based magazine printer Prinovis closes, resulting in a de facto monopoly for its rival Walstead, which now prints nine of the UK's top 10 magazines  —  All bar one of top-selling titles now printed by London-based Walstead after closure of rival in Liverpool

item.title: 4億人以上のIPLクリケット・ストリーム視聴者を獲得し、NBC、HBO、WBDからコンテンツ権を獲得し、インドでディズニーに挑戦しているリライアンスのJioCinemaを見てみよう（Financial Times）。
item.description:
Financial Times:
A look at Reliance's JioCinema, which had 400M+ IPL cricket stream viewers, acquired content rights from NBC, HBO, and WBD, and is challenging Disney in India  —  Asia's richest man is on a mission to transform Reliance Industries into a digital group  —  India's richest man Mukesh Ambani …

item.title: Tidalは8月1日より、米国でHiFi層を1ドル増の11ドル／月、ファミリー層を2ドル増の17ドル／月にする予定で、HiFi Plusの価格は据え置き（Marc Schneider/Billboard）
item.description:
Marc Schneider / Billboard:
Tidal plans to increase its HiFi tier by $1 to $11/month and its family tier by $2 to $17/month in the US starting on August 1; HiFi Plus' pricing is unchanged  —  The trend of music streamers increasing their rates continues.  Next up: Spotify?  —  Following similar moves by Apple …

item.title: Metaは7月6日、Instagramのスタンドアローン版Twitter競合となるThreadsを発表する予定だ。
item.description:
Amanda Silberling / TechCrunch:
Meta plans to launch Instagram's standalone Twitter competitor Threads on July 6, per the pre-order App Store listing, which shows screenshots of some features  —  Instagram's rumored Twitter competitor just dropped on the iOS App Store in the U.S. The app will be called Threads …

item.title: Twitterによると、30日以内に、ユーザーがTweetDeckを使用するには、Blueに料金を支払う必要があるとのこと。
item.description:
@twittersupport:
Twitter says that in 30 days, users must pay for Blue to use TweetDeck, the new version of which supports full composer functionality, Spaces, polls, and more  —  We have just launched a new, improved version of TweetDeck. All users can continue to access their saved searches & workflows via https://tweetdeck.twitter.com/ by selecting “Try the new TweetDeck” in the bottom left menu. Some notes on getting started and the future of the product... https://twitter.com/...

item.title: Twitterのスタッフによると、データスクレイピングを防ぐためにレガシーAPIを削除したことがTweetDeckを壊し、Twitterはユーザーを「新しい改良版TweetDeck」に移行させる計画だという（Jay Peters/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Twitter staff say that removing legacy APIs to prevent data scraping broke TweetDeck and Twitter plans to move users to “a new, improved version of TweetDeck”  —  Twitter is officially launching its “new” version of TweetDeck to everyone, according to a tweet from Twitter's support account …
